page.title: 11ELMSTEAD BY_PASS
page.content: { Elmstead Market}is between{Colchester and the{coast.}Before the{By_pass}was {opened,11th June 1982}all traffic came through the village.At summer weekends there were often{traffic jams}and many {lorries}passed through on weekdays. It was very noisy, and difficult and very {dangerous}to cross the street.{Now}it is{quieter and safer.}A{census}of by_pass traffic{from 09.45 to 10.45}on a typical{weekday}and on a{Sunday showed many differences in usage by vehicles: TUES.11TH.JUNE 1985 SUN.23RD.JUNE 1985 {To coast & ports * To coast & ports Cars 289 * Cars 216 Coaches 10 * Coaches 45 Commercials 110 * Commercials 34 {To Colchester * To Colchester Cars 296 * Cars 920 Coaches 25 * Coaches 34 Commercials 122 * Commercials 35
